author: Annabel Fenwick Elliott For Mailonline
title: Photos capture the moment just before a disaster | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share This snap is timed so perfectly it almost looks as though his hand is meeting a solid surface The chap here appears completely oblivious thus far, but he's about to hear a loud splash In 2011, this cargo ship capsized catastrophically off New Zealandâ€™s North Island leaking oil into the ocean A surfing mishap unfolding before our eyes, with the moment just before she face plants captured Staggeringly, the pilot of this plane managed to crawl from the wreckage and survive after a botched stunt at the Royal Air Forces Association airshow in West Sussex last year The expression of the man who has just lobbed this wooden mallet at his friend's head is pretty priceless As is the face of utmost glee from this woman who is launching a surprise water attack This dog clearly suffered a case of tunnel vision when he charged after his Frisbee with scant regard for surrounding obstacles A gargantuan wave looms high over this railing as people sprint away from it (left) and (right) a young man suffering the consequences of an expertly aimed snowball Two men struggle at the bow of a boat as walls of water shoot up from either side The two people here are either serious thrill-seekers or have no idea what's about to hit them One wrong nudge and this probably priceless china vase is set to topple over and smash to smithereens Some of the characters here are clearly well-aware of this woman's impending doom, but she certainly isn't The slip here has already occurred but this poor man's bottom is yet to meet the pavement A man flees his pursuer during what is likely to be the controversial 'running of the bulls' festival in Spain This unfolding disaster is almost too grim for words, but it's safe to say that this woman's nice relaxing sunbathing session is about to be over Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
